summary: This document is an email chain from June 23, 2020, regarding a subpoena served on Amazon on June 12, 2020, seeking expedited shipping/delivery information for a relevant individual in an unspecified case. The email references a prior automatic reply from August 15, 2019.

persons.name: IMF
persons.role: Author of email requesting expedited subpoena response
persons.context: IMF is the sender of the June 23, 2020 email, requesting Amazon to expedite its response to a subpoena for shipping/delivery information related to a relevant individual.

events.title: Subpoena served on Amazon
events.description: A subpoena was served on Amazon, seeking shipping and delivery information for a relevant individual.

events.title: Request to expedite Amazon subpoena response
events.description: IMF sent an email requesting Amazon to expedite its response to the June 12 subpoena, specifically for shipping/delivery information, by the end of the week.

events.title: Automatic reply regarding prior subpoena
events.description: An automatic reply email was sent indicating the recipient was traveling for business and providing alternative contacts for law enforcement information requests.

keyFacts: A subpoena was served on Amazon on June 12, 2020, seeking shipping and delivery information for a relevant individual.
On June 23, 2020, a request was made to expedite Amazon's response to the subpoena, specifically for the shipping/delivery information, by the end of that week.
The email references a prior automatic reply from August 15, 2019, related to a different subpoena (CRIM1031692), indicating ongoing legal information requests.
The document does not specify the case or the 'relevant individual' the subpoena information pertains to.
